version_description: Performance improved. Bug fixes. More intuitive and native interface.
Performance and stability improvements.
Performance and stability improvements.
Rewritten from ground up. Speed, usability and stability improvements.

- Added ability to select in which browser you want to open links
- More themes
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Improvements
- Batch operations (move, remove, etc) speed increase significantly
- Persist sorting
- More sort options
- Show bookmark date
- Update to latest React-Native

Fixes
- Tags sort
- Fix infinite loading in bookmark edit screen

Improvements
- Show creation date of bookmark and collection in edit screen
- Now possible to create nested collection from bookmarks screen
- Navigate to collection from "Bookmarks" tab
- Redesign "Settings" tab
- Faster and more stable app
- Long press on bookmark to start selection now works again
- Remove images upload limit

Bug fixes
- Newly created screenshots now showed correctly
- Sometime app become unresponsive, now fixed
- Fix tags selection screen
- Dark theme in extension fixed
- In-app purchases
- iPad: when keyboard appear sometime view is scrolled, now fixed
- Force touch on bookmark when custom browser is selected now fixed
- Share extension: fix for some extreme cases
- Password autofill fixed

It's bug fixes and stability improvement update. New features will be arrived soon (1-2 weeks).

Improvements:
- Add collection: now possible to select icon
- Better dark theme support
- More modern Material Design look
- 20-30% faster application start and overall responsiveness
- Removed unused permissions

Bug fixes:
- Fix Share extension crashes
- Fix search autocomplete
- Overall stability improvements

Fix Extension
Improved performance

It's bug fixes and stability improvement update. New features will be arrived soon (1-2 weeks).

Improvements:
- Add collection: now possible to select icon
- Better dark theme support
- More modern Material Design look
- 20-30% faster application start and overall responsiveness
- Removed unused permissions

Bug fixes:
- Fix Share extension crashes
- Fix search autocomplete
- Overall stability improvements

New features:
- Upload images from photos and any other apps
- Edit bookmark URL
- Add new bookmark right from the app
- Search collections
- Search bookmarks with autocomplete

Improvements:
- Redesign add/edit screens for collections and bookmarks
- Tags selection screen better performance
- Better support for sharing from other apps

Fixes:
- Crash right after app start now fixed (sorry)
- No more In-app purchase bugs
- Dark theme
- Share extension memory consumption fix

Our app is now open-sourced, check out here https://github.com/raindropio/mobile

New features:
- 3D touch support for bookmarks (force touch to preview bookmark)
- iPad optimized layout (split-view)
- New dark theme optimized for AMOLED/HDR displays (pure black - saves your battery)

Improvements:
- Share extension now use the same settings as main app. It means that extension now support dark mode!
- Tags picker screen: now selected tags not duplicated in full list
- Upload statistics (how much free space remaining) in settings tab

Fixes:
- Search tab: now selected filters labels shows properly
Fix autocomplete for tags

Improvements
- Show creation date of bookmark and collection in edit screen
- Now possible to create nested collection from bookmarks screen
- Navigate to collection from "Bookmarks" tab
- Redesign "Settings" tab
- Faster and more stable app
- Long press on bookmark to start selection now works again
- Remove images upload limit

Bug fixes
- Newly created screenshots now showed correctly
- Sometime app become unresponsive, now fixed
- Fix tags selection screen
- Dark theme in extension fixed
- In-app purchases
- iPad: when keyboard appear sometime view is scrolled, now fixed
- Force touch on bookmark when custom browser is selected now fixed
- Share extension: fix for some extreme cases
- Password autofill fixed
Fix scroll issues in edit bookmark or collection screens
Fix share extension for upcoming iOS 13

Improvements
- Batch operations (move, remove, etc) speed increase significantly
- Persist sorting
- More sort options
- Show bookmark date
- Update to latest React-Native

Fixes
- Tags sort
- Fix infinite loading in bookmark edit screen
Fix Safari preview crash that happen for small part of users

- Fix bookmark screenshots. Now they load way faster!
- Support animated GIF images
- Support for PDF and Office files (only from web, uploads will be implemented soon)
- Internally now all images are WebP, it means that they smaller and faster to load

- Now images look pixel-perfect, in respect of device pixel density
- Screenshots now loaded with indicator (in bookmark edit screen)
- Fix bug in search screens, now bookmarks again editable
Now possible to upload your own PDF, Office and Video files. They will have thumbnail and preview support!

Now entire content of every web-page and PDF that youâ€™ve saved is fully searchable and have permanent copy (only in PRO).

Other improvements:
- When you search in collection, results from other collections are showed below
- Better dark mode support

Bug fixes:
- Some specific links opened in preview crashed the app. Now fixed
- Performance increase

Improvements:
- Better performance and memory consumption for users who have thousands of collections

Bugfixes:
- Share extension now login correctly in iOS 13.4 beta 2
Bug fixes
Breaking: All new subscriptions will be auto-renewable. This change doesn't effect users with existing PRO account

Support for iPad Split View and Slide Over!
Now you can use Raindrop.io and other apps at the same time. Drag and drop is fully supported (no files support)
Bug fixes

Sign-in with Apple now fully supported

Improvements
- Now you can create collection right away from search

Bug fixes:
- In bookmark edit screen when you type something in title field and tap on "Tags", title will be overidden by previous value. Now fixed
- Fix sidebar on ipad
- Now tap on non-html link not crash app

- Fix Edge browser support
- Support changing app language
- Fix bugs

- Fix thumbnails
- Improve translation and add 3 new languages: Korean, Hindi and Japan

New features
- Manual reorder of collections and bookmarks
- Tablet UI
- Default collection setting where to save new bookmarks in Share extension
- Show/hide bookmark details
- Filters and tags are now showed in home screen
- Tags cloud in search screen

Improvements
- Load times significantly reduced, almost every interaction now instant with small memory footprint
- Automatic sync when application goes foreground. It means now you always see latest data, no need to refresh anymore

Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Some users have been reported that our share extension is disappearing sometime. This update (I'm hope so) will fix this problem.

- Fix bug of invite member by email
- Fix tags list in search
- Fix share extension login
- Fix language selection for kk, uk
- Improve translation for de, fr
- Another try to fix share extension disappear

- Massively reduce app size
- Another try to fix Share extension sometime disappear for some users (Definitely an iOS 14 bug, if you still have this issue please restart your iPhone/iPad)

Brand new Share extension:
Now it works almost instantly and look and feel as our browser extension.
It simple and intuitive, no more confusion. All bugs are fixed now.

Improvements
- Tags screen now support comma key
- Swipe to dismiss in share extension support
- Overall speed improvement

Bug fixes:
- Fix crash for some links when open in internal browser

- Ask for save in unsaved new bookmark form
- Support multiline descriptions
- Bug fixes

New features:
- Change app languages in app settings

Improvements
- Performance improvement for collections/bookmarks list

Bug fixes
- Share extension

- Login or register with username
- Separate setting for auto save for mobile 
- Fix search crash for some users
- More obvious expand button in collections list

- Performance improvement, especially on low-end devices
- Fix bug when keyboard disappear in tag selector screen
- Improve translation

- Fix bug when opening a file requires authentication
- Speed up collections reorder performance

- Fix Google Sign in bug
- Fix bug when some images from Photos can't be uploaded
Fix Facebook login
Fix Facebook login. Sorry!
